channel.title: Recommends on Thomas Maintenance
channel.description: Recent content in Recommends on Thomas Maintenance

item.title: What Others are saying...
item.description: “We have enjoyed working with TMi since 1990. Always pleased with their team’s attention to detail and excellent communication.” -- Bunny Porteous, Senior Property Manager First Services Residential “Highly Recommend your firm for going the extra mile. Great Staff” -- Liz Der, Operations Coordinator Gammon International TMi has been steady and reliable for many years comparing with other janitorial contractors we came across in the past years … -- Andrew Hui, Property Manager Dorset Realty of Canada Ltd
